description: Surrogate unique identifier for the work order type record.
Date-time when the work order type record was last modified (likely system-generated); confirm whether creation or last update.
Human-readable description of the work order type displayed in user interfaces and reports.
Compact code used to categorize the work order type for integrations, rules, and reporting.
Identifier of the corresponding record in the legacy source system, retained for migration mapping and audit; confirm originating system.
Name of the table or entity in the legacy system that held this record, used for lineage and traceability; confirm source.
Indicates whether this work order type pertains to tire-related service or maintenance activities.
